entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a location where the first time Harry went to.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is an organization that has vaults and is mentioned as a symbol of belonging to the Wizarding world.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is a person who Harry wants Ron and Hermione to understand about Gringotts before speaking to him.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a person who was trusted by Voldemort and her husband.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a person to whom Voldemort never told the truth about the diary.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who told Harry that Gringotts is the safest place in the world for anything you want to hide.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who had a Horcrux and was mentioned by Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person to whom Harry spoke about Gringotts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person to whom Harry spoke about Gringotts.

relationships.description: Harry has an interest in Gringotts as it is a symbol of belonging to the Wizarding world.
Voldemort trusted Bellatrix and her husband.
Harry wants Ron and Hermione to understand about Gringotts before speaking to Ollivander.
Voldemort never told Lucius Malfoy the truth about the diary.
Hagrid said that Gringotts is the safest place in the world for anything you want to hide.
Ron admires Harry as he understands him.
